Sakura looked up at her friend, "Naruto.....You've got to help me!" Sakura pleaded.

"Of course I will Sakura! What can I do to help?" Naruto asked.

Sakura sighed in relief, Naruto was a good person at heart. "Well there was this Jutzu I found, and I tried it and It shrunk me! We've got to find a cure!" Sakura explained.

Naruto nodded, "Okay, but first lets get you out of here." Naruto said as his fingers closed around her gently.

Sakura shook with fear as she was encased in the dark sweaty fist.

"Don't worry, I've got you Sakura" Naruto said softly...

When they arrived to Naruto's home, Sakura asked why he taken her here.
"You'll be safer here, I don't want you to get hurt. I'm going to find Kakashi-sensei, maybe he could help" said Naruto and left, leaving Sakura on table.

It took a while to find Kakashi. When Naruto found him, he shouted out "Kakashi-sensei, Sakura is in trouble, she was trying some jutsu and fallen under its effects"
"Take me to her"

Meanwhile, Sakura was exploring Naruto's table, finding lots of photos of herself, realizing Naruto is really fond of her. She never really admited it to herself, but she also wasn't thinking of him as just friend.

After about 2 hours from when Naruto left, he returned with Kakashi-sensei.
Naruto explained everything to Kakashi-sensei on a way here.
"So where is she, I can't see her anywhere."
"Right here, I left her on a table"
"Oh my, its true. But I'm sorry, I don't think I can help with this. We should propably ask Tsunade"

13.content:
The head of the Hyuuga clan stood tall, hovering over the panting form of Neji. "You're training is complete. I have shown you the alternate use for the divine strikes. Now..." and smile crosses his face "...go out and test your new abilities."

"Hmph." Neji said as he rose to his feet and slowly walked away.

----

Hinata strolled through the woods as she did on her normal morning routine. It had been 3 weeks since she gained Naruto praise on the filler episode...er...I mean, mission to help Naruto find Sasuke. She was talking the day off from training, trying to relax and find some inner peace before the next mission was given to her team.

"Hinata, you seem far too relaxed"

Hinata twirled around to find Neji staring back at her. Her mind was put at ease slightly until she noticed Neji was in a striking position, similar to the divine strikes.

"AAA!" Neji attacked Hinata, points of chakra forcing their way through her relaxed form. However, this felt different. Instead of shutting the chakra points in her body, it felt as through her chakra was...changing...

"N-Nej.." Hinata gasped before she felt she could no longer move. She fell hard on her back, but did not black out as pain filled her. "What...did you...do?"

"There is another way to use the divine strikes..." started Neji "...that instead of stopping the flow of chakra, you use your chakra control to make slight alterations in the opponents chakra." Neji looked down at Hinata's sweating form. "I'm sure after feeling it for yourself, you can understand how to use it. Weird as that may sound, but it is true." he turned away "That is how I learned it. Besides, there are benefits which I'm sure you'll find most appealing"

Neji walked away as Hinata's altered chakra began to change her. Her hair grew out, becoming a lighter shade of purple and reaching as far as her ass would be. Her skin smoothed out and her breasts increased in size to about a C-cup. Her muscles grew stronger and leaner, looking as if she had trained every day of her life non-stop.

The last changes were the most drastic. She felt a pressure building up in her loins. Hinata knew she came to be a mini-goddess and knew in the back of her mind how to alter other peoples chakra to change their body and mind to her liking. She put a smile on her face,
"Naruto-kun where are you?"

15511.title: Naruto's Size

choices: Take her shoes off and torture him with her barefeet
Put him down the back of her pants
155111.content: Naruto got smaller and smaller until he found himself at 1/5 inches tall! He looked around and began to scream. ''What the heck happened to me!?'' But suddenly he felt the ground start to shake, and looked up to see a giant Sakura smiling down at him. ''Well well well what do you know, my plan worked!'' Naruto was too shocked by Sakura's immense size to even move as she picked him up and put him in her pocket. They arrived at her house and she took him out of her pocket. She chuckled, ''how's it feel to be so small Naruto?'' Naruto was still too shocked to speak, so Sakura did the talking for him, ''well now that your so small i guess i better find some sort of use for you! Since you're gonna be like this forever anyway!'' Naruto finally spoke up, ''What!? Sakura why did you do this to me!?'' Sakura grinned evilly at him, ''Because i wanted to! Now shut up shrimp! I'm trying to decide what to do with you.'' Sakura snapped. But Naruto didnt shut up, ''No! I want you to change me back now!'' He yelled. But his yells were stifled when Sakura's giant finger came down on top of him and held him down. Naruto could hardly breath, the finger had knocked the wind out of him and was now preventing him from breathing. Then Sakura knew what she wanted to do with her new toy...
155111.title: Sakura's New Toy

choices: "My feet are really sore, i could use a foot massage!"
"How would you like the honor of being able to lick my feet?
1551111.content:
Sakura looked down at the tiny Naruto trapped underneath her finger, and grinned evilly. She picked him up and placed him on the ground. Naruto sat there on his rump looking up at her. She looked down at him and began to take her shoes off. She halfway took one off and dangled it by her big toe, then she kicked it off almost crushing Naruto. She then kicked off her other shoe and sighed in relief.

Sakura flexed her toes looking down at the tiny Naruto who was looking up at them in awe. His mouth gaped open as he stared up at the well cared for soles. Sakura saw this and giggled, "So Naruto you like my feet huh? Well how would you like to take a closer look?" she said as she lowered her foot down onto him. The heat radiating off of her feet was unbelievable! And once he found himself pinned to the ground with his face inbetween her big and index toe he was actually sweating!

Her sole was warm and somewhat sticky from the sweat from being in those shoes all day long. With his face inbetween her big and index toe Naruto got a wiff of the odor that accompanied the sweat. It wasnt TOO bad, but it was anything but pleasent. Sakura bent over a bit to get a better look. (although she was still sitting on the bed) She grinned, "So Naruto, how do you like it down there?" she said wiggling her toes and giggling. She slowly propped her foot up on the heel freeing him. Naruto sat up and took in a breath of fresh air. "Oh Naruto!" she said. Naruto looked up but could only see the foot that was blocking his view instead of her face. She then propped her other foot up in front of him...
1551111.title: Sakura Feet

choices: Sakura decides it's time for another thing
15511112.content:
How would you like the honor of being able to lick my feet? Sakura said to Naruto, who was in the middle of her huge (to him) feet, but several seconds passed and Naruto was just looking up at Sakura, not taking her question too seriously.

"Well, what are you waiting for?" Sakura said annoyed, looking down and wiggling her toes to the tiny Naruto, who reluctantly started walking to Sakura's right foot slowly, taking short sniffs of the smell, Sakura then smiled as he did this.

When Naruto reached the big toe, he was a bit dizzy by the smell of sakura foot, but after picturing in his mind what would happen if he made a giant sakura angry (it was already painful to do it when he was normal size), he sighed and started licking, "Oh Naruto, that tickles!!!" Sakura said laughing.

What happens next?
15511112.title: Licking Sakura's feet

Naruto ran towards the gigantic door of Sasuke's house. He was able to squeeze through the crack at the bottom. He stood up and looked around Sasuke's house. ''man! if his furniture is this big think of how big...'' Naruto didnt have time to finish however for an earthquake shook him off balance and he fell onto the floor! ''oh no! an earthquake!'' suddenly Naruto saw the giant Sasuke coming towards him. and he realized it wasnt an earthquake, he was so small that every step Sasuke took was like an earthquake to him! Naruto just had enough time to get out of the way before he was crushed beneath Sasuke's giant feet! Sasuke stopped at the door, giving Naruto the chance to climb onto Sasuke's toes that were sticking out of his shoes! It was quite a ride for Naruto as Sasuke walked back to his room. For Naruto accidentally was shaken off of Sasuke's big toe and ended up wedged inbetween his big and index toes!

He licked Sasuke's foot sweat for nothing!!!!? Naruto gagged and spit out Sasuke's toe jam, it was then Naruto got a wiff of Sasuke's feet. They were stinky from all that sweat! Naruto pinched his nose, ''pee-u!!! Sasuke!!! Help!!!!!!!!!'' Naruto screamed as loud as he could up at the gigantic Sasuke. Sasuke..

INBETWEEN YOUR TOES!'' Sasuke slowly looked down and saw something tiny wedged inbetween his big toe and index toe. Sasuke......
155112221.title: Sasuke's Discovery

choices: Try and kill Naruto once and for all!
Play with him, the way a cat plays with a mouse before he kills it.
1551122211.content:
"What is that?", Sasuke said. "OH GROSS! A BUG!! How the hell did it get in my toes? Yuck this thing is ugly......kinda looks like Naruto...heh heh."
"OH HA HA SASUKE!!! NOW GET ME OUT OF HERE!! SASUKE!!!!", screamed the tiny Naruto, now slightly green from the stench of Sasuke's toes. To his releif, Sasuke bent over to have a better look.
"Well well well!", said the smirking Sasuke. "And how did we get into this little predicament?" He said to the itty-bitty Naruto.
"Long story...", replied Naruto. "You see, I was walking down the road, and- AARGH!! WHAT"RE YOU DOING SASUKE?! STOP!!!" Sasuke started to press his toes together, in an attempt to crush Naruto in between his toes.
"You know, i've always disliked you, Naruto. Your smart-alek jokes, your over-confidence.. it sickened me. Now, I might just have to scilence you once and for all. Or....should i torture you, the way you tortured me with you shrill little voice?!" Said the gigantic Sasuke.
1551122211.title: In the Ghe-toes

choices: She also has some fun with him
15511222111.content:
Sasuke had had it. He was going to finish off Naruto once and for all! No more, "Beleive it!", no more dorky laugh, no more over cocky-ness. It was going to be all over soon. Sasuke lifted the front of his foot, and was just about to stomp on Naruto with such great force, when he heard a voice.
"Sasuke? What are you doing?" said Sakura, who emerged from the woods. It totally took Sasuke by surprise, he almost fell over, with Naruto still in his sandal! "Naruto! I can't let Sakura see me kill this little twerp. Think of what she'll do...." thought Sasuke. He covered the semi-consious Nartuo with his toes. "Uh....nothing! I was just heading back.... I just stepped in something...heh."
Naruto freaked when he heard this. Sooner or later that statment would be true. He also heard Sakura's voice. "SAKURA!!! SAKURA! HELP ME!!" screamed the terrified little Naruto. "SASUKE IS TRYING TO KILL ME!!"
"What is that noise? Sasuke, are you hiding something?"
"WHAT!! NO! Of course not!" said the nervous Sasuke.
"Then lift your foot up," said Sakura. "I hear something....." Sasuke had to comply, or otherwise she would think he was up to something. he lifted up his foot, and there laid an itty bitty Naruto. Naruto looked up at Sakura. "OH THANK GOD YOU'RE HERE! THIS FOOL IS TRYING TO SQUASH ME!!" cried Naruto.
"Oh good lord!" Sakura said. Then a thought crossed her mind....
15511222111.title: Saved by Sakura......or not?

choices: Hinata, trying to find Naruto to confess to him.
15511222112.content:
Sasuke decided to have some fun with this tiny Naruto. So he lifted up the front of his foot, and let Naruto fall backwards, who was now facing up, staring at Sasuke's huge foot.
"W-WAIT!! SASUKE! PLEASE!", cried the terrified Naruto, but it was no use.
Sasuke brought his foot down, and ever so slightly, he began to put the pressure on Naruto, crushing him underneath his massive, sweaty foot.
"AAARGHH!! S-STOP! SASUKE!", and to Naruto's amazement, Sasuke stopped. He lifted his foot up again, and this timed, he curled his toes and landed them behind Naruto. He then pushed the slightley limp Naruto into the path of his toes.
"*cough cough*...Sasuke...." moaned the fatuiged Naruto. But Sasuke didn't stop. He rested his foot on Naruto, and then picked him up between his toes and foot, crushing him while he's at it. He brought him higher and higher, and then dropped him. Naruto landed with a soft, "whump" onto Sasuke's huge, firm sandal.
"You don't know HOW LONG i have wated for this moment." said the smirking Sauske. "Although, i do feel a bit bad for you, dying here, with no satisfaction, no pleasure. You want to get in bed with Sakura, don't you? Heh heh heh. Well here, this is from Sakura to you!" He then positioned his big toe over Naruto's...er..."family jewls"...and brought it down on it. What a rush Naruto was feeling! Pure terror mixed with.....pleasure. Sasuke was shuffling his toe all over Naruto's "package",lifintg his toe, bringing it back down, crushing him a bit, all-in-all massaging Naruto's bulge, and could see the look on Naruto's face...he was enjoying this.
When out of the blue, came a familiar face.
15511222112.title: Not good for Naruto...well, maybe a bit.

choices: Sasuke has other things in mind for Naruto.
1551122212.content:
"What the hell is that?" Sasuke asked himself as he leaned down slightly. Naruto watched one of his giant hands coming down upon him. This brought him both relief and a little fright. The Uchiha's thumb and index finger grasped Naruto and plucked him from his sweaty confinement.

"Is it...a bug?" he asked again, raising the inch tall object to his face to examine it. Naruto cringed as he looked into Sasuke's face. His giant rival had so much power over him like this, and he was nothing compared to him! The thought drove the fox boy crazy. Sasuke's eyes widened in shock when he realized what he had just picked up.

"Naruto?!"

"It's about time! Do you know what I've had to do to try and get you to notice me?! Now help me!"

Sasuke looked over the shrunken ninja for a moment.

Naruto thundered from above as he sat down on a building which sagged under his weight. Sasuke reluctantly removed his other hand from his nose and immedietely the smell assaulted his nostrils, they burned from the giant Naruto's terrible foot odor. Naruto felt something between his toes, he looked down and saw Sasuke lying there with his face pressed between his big and second toe. "Hey! What did I say about slacking off!?" Naruto shouted angrily and using his toes, he lifted Sasuke's limp body into the air and set his leg on his other knee. Plucking Sasuke from between his toes with an audible squelching noise, he inspected the toe jam covered Sasuke. "Heheheh looks like the little bastard couldn't even handle his first task!" 155121212.title: Giant Uzumaki Stench

It doesn't affect Naruto and Sasuke is digested
1551212121.content:
Naruto glares at the unconscious Uchiha. “Heh, you're weak Sasuke. I don’t have any use for someone as weak as you! Guess I'll snack on you!”

The giant fox boy tossed Sasuke’s limp body into his open mouth and closed it. Without a care, he swallowed him whole in a single gulp. He hadn’t even bother to savor him, since he was covered in his toe jam and probably tasted horrible. Sasuke traveled down the gullet and landed in the stomach with a splash. As he laid there, he slowly woke up.

“Ugh…my head...Where am I? Why is it so hot?” the Uchiha mumbled in his confused state. He looked around and remembered Naruto. “Naruto! Where is he?! He made me massage his feet and-” Sasuke stopped at the thought. The fleshy walls around him were moving and gurgling. "This can only mean one thing...I must be in his stomach!!!”

Without a second to lose, the Uchiha started to make handsigns. “I'm not gonna be that loser's shit! I won't end like this... Fire Style: Fire Ball Jutsu!”
1551212121.title: Naruto Swallows Sasuke

choices: Naruto is still hungry and he goes to search for more meat
Naruto notices a tiny Kiba at his feet
15512121212.content:
Naruto rubbed his stomach, knowing his cocky rival would soon become a part of him forever. Expecting to relax as Sasuke digested, he was surprised when his stomach began to feel really weird. Slowly but surely it started to get warmer, making Naruto wonder what was going on. On the inside, Sasuke was spewing as many fireballs as he could.

“Come on! Throw up already!!”

Unfortunately for the poor Sasuke, Naruto was just too big to be affected by his attempts. Likewise, his stomach was much bigger and tougher. With a last attempt, Sasuke spew a much bigger fireball, hoping it would work. Sasuke fell to his knees, as his chakra was depleted and his stamina was no use. Looking around weakly, he noticed the acid rising. He could feel his skin start to tingle and his clothes starting to dissolve away. After all this time of rivalry, he was going to end up as the fox boy’s next dump. Naruto had won. Sasuke was too weak and tired to shout, only cursing in his head as he sunk under the surface of the acids.

Naruto licked his lips as the warm feeling in his stomach went away. He was impressed with his rival’s last attempt, but that was all the recognition he was going to give food. His thoughts were now directed elsewhere.

15512121221111.title: Naruto falls asleep and grows even bigger

choices: Feels guilty about unknowingly destroying the village.
155121212211112.content:
The villagers began to run as Naruto's body showed no sign of stopping. Soon his massive smelly feet were casting a huge shadow over the village, as his body flattened the surrounding forest. Before long, his feet began to bulldoze through the village, crushing everything in their path. Suddenly Naruto shifted slightly, and bent his legs upward, meaning his giant feet now covered most of the village. As his feet now expanded flat along the ground, people were trapped like flies in honey in between his huge, toejam covered toes. Sasuke, who had been freed when the rope tying him to Naruto's foot snapped, was less than a speck of dust amongst the thousands now sealed to his feet. Finally, Naruto stopped growing at about 10000 feet. His humongous form stretched almost 2 miles tall, with his feet being about a 1/4 of a mile long. Even his titanic toes, at around 85 feet tall, dwarfed most of the buildings in the village.

Naruto began to stir. He stretched out, raising his toes high in the air, and crushing most of what was left of the village and forest. He suddenly realised he'd grown during his nap. He sat up and looked around, surveying his new view of the world. He then glanced down, noting the near total destruction of the village at his gigantic smelly feet. What does he do?

155221.title: Tiny Kiba

1552212.content: Kiba is on a mission with...
1552212.title: Shippuden

15522121.content:
Tsunade had assigned Kiba on a mission with Naruto. This was a special mission for Kiba because he was the leader assigned. Their mission according to Tsunade was to find a rare flower known as the Tokata, that has an weird affect on some peoples chakra, and bring it back to the village. All went according to plan until Kiba found the flower. When he went to pull it up the flower sprayed a gas that made him pass out. When he awoke he was laying on something soft, as he opened his eyes he sees Naruto's concerned face.

"Hey Kiba, are you alright?" Naruto asked. Something was wrong. As SNaruto helps him up Kiba finds that instead of being eye level with Naruto he was now standing so his eyes were looking right into Naruto's orange-pant crotch.
Remembering that he had not answered Naruto's question Kiba said "Yeah I'm all right, though I am kind of freaked out that I'm eye level with your crotch..." after he finish speaking he blushed for what he just said and was worried on how Naruto would take it. Naruto just laughed "Heh, you were taller than me by 2 inches, but now you're A LOT shorter than me! I feel big..." "Hey, don't get too cocky Naruto..." Kiba replied.

After making sure that Kiba was alright, Naruto asked him if he wanted a ride back to the village. But seeing it was almost dark, Kiba said that they should rest for the night and take off in the morning. Hopefully he would be back to his normal size after a good night's sleep. However during the night Kiba shrank to...
15522121.title: Mission with Naruto

155221212.content:
The next morning Kiba once again wakes up to see Naruto looming over him. Kiba looked around and realized that what he thought was a heavy warm blanket was actually his clothing. “What!? This is terrible!! How am I going to carry out the mission if I’m only 3 inches tall!?” Kiba panicked. Naruto frowned down at him. “That’s all your worried about? Carrying out the mission? What about yourself, dog breath?” Kiba jumped to his feet. “Don't talk to me like that Naruto!” “Or what, you’ll make me step on you?” Naruto smirked. Kiba gulped. Naruto picked up Kiba’s clothing and things. Then reaches down at him. “Sigh...I guess I’ll have to carry your dog ass, and complete the mission by myself now.” Kiba feels Naruto’s fingers wrap around him as he is pressed against his soft, warm palm. “Put me down Naruto! I'm the one leading this mission!!!”

"Don’t be such an idiot, Kiba! You won’t even make it back to the village in this state! So yeah... deal with the fact that I'll do this mission!” Naruto said pointing to himself with his other hand.
155221212.title: The Incredible Shrinking Kiba

choices: Naruto imprisons Kiba inside his sandal
1552212121.content:
"I am the leader! I am doing this mission! I won't let you steal the spotlight, Naruto!!!” Kiba shouted attempting to free himself from Naruto's hand. "Man Kiba, I thought you had changed for those 3 years passed, but you're still the same cocky mutt you were 3 years ago at the Chunin Exams!" Naruto sighed.

"Wha-- what did you say? I dare you to say that again..." Kiba said in a dark tone. "Uh-oh, looks like I got little Kiba angry..." Naruto snickered.

"You...are...DEAD!!!" Kiba growled as he broke from Naruto's hand and lunged for his face. He landed on his nose, clinging to it. "Ninja Art of Beast Mimicry: All-Fours Jutsu!!!" Kiba screamed as he began to scratch and bite Naruto's nose. "Aaahhhh!!! Why you little!" Naruto growled plucking the rabid Kiba off his nose. Naruto now had tiny little teeth marks and a few scratches on his nose and wasn't too happy about it. He narrowed his eyes at the tiny little dog ninja...
1552212121.title: Angry Kiba

choices: Naruto finishes the mission and lets Kiba out
15522121211.content:
Naruto then sat down and placed the tiny Kiba on the ground. Kiba watched as Naruto began to slip off his left sandal. "Uh....what are you doing Naruto?" Kiba asked. Naruto then picked Kiba up and placed him inside the black sandal. Kiba's sensitive nose was immedietly engulfed by the strong smell of Naruto's feet. "Sorry, haven't washed my feet in a while but I have to make sure you don't do this again!" Naruto said. Kiba's eyes bugged out when he saw Naruto's toes enter inside the black sandal! He tried to run but Naruto's foot landed on him. Kiba was still on his back when this happened, so as Naruto's foot rested onto the moist insole, Kiba's face was buried in the soft, sweaty, foul smelling flesh of Naruto's sole.

Kiba couldn't move, and the only air he could breathe was Naruto's foot odor. He wanted to puke, not only was he being forced to endure the smell of his feet, Naruto's foot was pressed against his lips, and he tasted a salty bitter taste along with the smell of Naruto's foot that somehow found it's way into his mouth. It only got worse as Naruto started walking, each step knocking the wind out of Kiba as Naruto's sole rose and then fell back onto him all over again.
15522121211.title: Imprisoned Inside Naruto's Sandal

choices: Kiba has to take a shower too!
Kiba tries to escape while Naruto bathes
155221212111.content:
After about an hour of being crushed again and again by Naruto's foul smelling foot, the weight was finally lifted off Kibas body and light streamed in the prison along with fresh air. Kiba saw a giant blue eye peer into the sandal and felt it tip and he slid out into Naruto's hand. Kiba was weak and beat up, and he was covered in Naruto's foot sweat and smelled like feet. Kiba just layed there breathing heavily.

"Sorry I had to do that, but YOU didn't have to attack me!" Naruo said. Kiba didn't have the energy to say what was on his mind. "I'll take you to my house for tonight." Naruto's fingers slowly closed around Kiba's small body as he began to walk home. Soon they were at Naruto's house and in his bedroom, which was very messy. "I'm gonna go get a shower. You stay here, Kiba!" Naruto said placing Kiba on his bed and leaving the room with a towel.
155221212111.title: Drenched in foot odor

1552212121111.content:
Kiba sat on the bed for a few moments before snapping. "Grrr... That idiot gets to take a shower while I'm left drenched in his foot odor!? I don't think so!" Kiba walked over to the edge of the bed and used the blanket to slide down. He ran through Naruto's open door and looked around. "Wow, Naruto's house is huge...or maybe I'm saying that just because I'm small." he murmured.

Suddenly, the sound of running water reached Kiba's ears. He looked over to a door next to Naruto's room. The door was open and steam was coming out of it. "Arg, there's no time to look around! I still smell like Naruto's dirty feet!"

The dog ninja ran over to the bathroom door and snuck in. Naruto's form could be seen behind the tub's dark curtains. His jumpsuit had been left in a pile on the floor.

"I don't care if he's in there, I'm not waiting any longer. I've had enough of this stink." the dog ninja said angrily. He stripped of his clothes and dropped them into a small pile. He then proceeded to climb the tub's outer edge, using chakra to avoid slipping on its moist surface. When he reached the top, he made sure he was behind Naruto and slid down the wet walls of the tub, landing with a small splash. Naruto hadn't noticed the shrunken ninja at all, as he was too busy washing his hair. Kiba, however, noticed every inch of Naruto's gigantic body. For such a young boy, he had a nice build. Of course, Kiba wasn't saying it was better than his. He'd never admit that, but he could'd help but stare at the fox boy's nicely round bubble ass. "...Ahh! What the hell am I thinking! Ugh, I have to get it together!" As Naruto washed his hair, drops of shampoo fell down onto the tub floor. Kiba used one of these soapy drops to wash his own hair.

Naruto looked down and saw a tiny little Kiba bathing in the shower with him. "AH!!!!! KIBA WHAT ARE YOU DOING!?" Naruto said trying to cover up his nether regions. "Trying to get the smell of your nasty feet off of me!" Kiba yelled up at the nude blond who towered like a god over him. "Well can't you do it AFTER I'm done!? This is weird even if you are small!" Naruto said. "You know... on second thought, I think I can wait." Kiba said starting to climb out of the bathtub.

"Wait!" Naruto said grabbing Kiba and bringing him slowly up, past his crotch which was now uncovered, his stomach, and finally Kiba was face to face with him. "W-What are you doing, Naruto?" Kiba asked not liking the look in Naruto's blue eyes. "Well, actually since you're already here I thought maybe you could..."
1552212121111.title: In the shower with Naruto

choices: Kiba has to rub Naruto's feet
15522121211111.content:
"Well, since you're already here I thought maybe you could help me wash up." Naruto said with an evil grin. Kiba looked at the fox boy with a puzzled expression. "Um...what do you mean by that?" he asked, getting kind of worried. "Well, you see..." began Naruto. He reached over to the soap and held it in his other hand. "When I got in here, I forgot to change the soap. This little thing is hardly big enough to clean my entire body anymore." Kiba still wasn't getting what Naruto was trying to say. "Then you should get another one, idiot." "I already have another one." Naruto smirked tightening his fist.

"Then why--" Kiba began to say, before stopping and staring at the god-like Naruto with widened eyes. "No...you can't mean..." Without a second thought, Naruto brought the diminished soup and Kiba together, rubbing them against eachother. The entire time the dog ninja was kicking and screaming. Soon the entire body of the shrunken dog ninja was covered in soap suds. Kiba looked at Naruto with fearful eyes and gave another yell of protest as he was slammed into the fox boy's chest. His screams were muffled as he was dragged across the smooth surface of the giant blond ninja's skin. Kiba felt the bumps of Naruto's nipples as he glided over them. He was soon moved down to the flat stomach, where he could feel young abs developing.

Naruto closed his eyes as he enjoyed the feeling of Kiba's small body rubbing against his own. This was by far the greatest shower he had ever taken. Not only was he getting the day's worth of sweat and uncleanness off him, but he was also humiliating Kiba by reducing him to a bar of soap. After his waist was clean, he brought Kiba up to his left armpit and shoved him into it head first. Kiba screamed as a smell worse than Naruto's feet assaulted his sensitive nose. His entire body was covered in Naruto's armpit sweat. The dog ninja breathed a sigh of relief when he was taken from the disgusting pit, only to cry out again when he was forced into the other. After both armpits got the Kiba treatment, Naruto moved to his arms next.

This entire thing was embarrassing for the tiny Inuzuka. Not only was he being used like soap, but he was being constantly reminded how much more muscular and sexy Naruto was than him. He had seen the fox boy naked before in the hotsprings, but never like this. After Naruto had finished both his arms and shoulders, he felt like he just HAD to do one thing to Kiba before he moved on to his legs. He stretched out his right arm and placed Kiba on his joint in front of his bicep. He gave it a good flex, crushing the small Kiba against the muscle.

"Heheh, my bicep could probably snap you in half if I wanted it to, Kiba!" Naruto exclaimed. Amused by his little joke, he took Kiba again and applied some more soap before he started cleaning his legs and feet. Kiba was reintroduced to those horrible soles again as Naruto rubbed all the dirt from them. After finishing up there, he brought the soapy dog up to his face to observe his pitiful state. Kiba was gasping for air, his eyes wet from tears.

"Only two places left, Kiba!" Kiba looked into the eyes of the cruel Uzumaki. "C'mon Naruto! No more!! I'm s-sorry for sneaking into the shower with you!" Kiba panted. "This isn't about you sneaking in, dog breath! I just need to clean myself!" Naruto chuckled as he brought Kiba to his behind and slapped him againt his left butt cheek. He gave his ass a nice washing, even sticking his new soap up his anus to clean that too. First the feet, then the armpits, and now his ass. The smell of pure shit tortured Kiba's poor nose for a good three minutes before he was finally removed.

By now, Kiba knew just how stupid he was for getting into the shower with the giant fox boy. It was like he was basically asking for this. The thought of it almost being over brought a slight feeling of joy. However, that feeling was replaced with utter disgust and fear as he came face to face with Naruto's giant cock and balls. Naruto was obviously enjoying this, as his dick was hard and twitching. The blond god first had Kiba wash his balls, rubbing him across their soft surface. When those were clean, he moved the shrunken dog up and down his manhood. Moans escaped Naruto's lips as he did this. Kiba's own body betrayed him as he, too, started to get erect from being rubbed along Naruto's monster. A short time of stroking and moaning later caused both boys to reach their climax and come. Naruto's cum landed inside the tub, none of it thankfully getting on Kiba. The small ninja's own seed was washed from Naruto's hand by the shower. The fox boy leaned his muscular back against the wall, panting and he looked down at Kiba in his hand.

Naruto turned off the shower and stepped out of it. He dried Kiba and him off and wrapped himself in a towel. Walking out of the bathroom and back into his room, he placed the still nude Kiba on his bed and started getting changed into his pajamas.

Kiba laid on Naruto's bed as the orange giant got changed. Despite being introduced to almost every corner of Naruto's sweaty body, he smelled better than before. What was he going to do? What if Naruto wanted another round with him tomorrow? What if he had more plans for the helpless ninja? There was nothing he could do to stop him. He was tired and spent from the shower. Before he could worry anymore, he felt the bed shift as Naruto sat down on it. The small Kiba looked up at Naruto, who was staring down at him. He was worried at what the giant fox boy was going to do next. As Naruto moved, Kiba braced himself.
15522121211111.title: Kiba and his Blond God
